Malachi or Malachias__04.1: For behold the day shall come kindled as a furnace: and all the proud, and all that do wickedly shall be stubble: and the day that cometh shall set them on fire, saith the Lord of hosts, it shall not leave them root, nor branch.
Malachi or Malachias__04.2: But unto you that fear my name, the Sun of justice shall arise, and health in his wings: and you shall go forth, and shall leap like calves of the herd.
Malachi or Malachias__04.3: And you shall tread down the wicked when they shall be ashes under the sole of your feet in the day that I do this, saith the Lord of hosts.
Malachi or Malachias__04.4: Remember the law of Moses my servant, which I commanded him in Horeb for all Israel, the precepts, and judgments.
Malachi or Malachias__04.5: Behold I will send you Elias the prophet, before the coming of the great and dreadful day of the Lord.
Malachi or Malachias__04.6: And<u>he shall turn the heart</u>of the fathers to the children, and the heart of the children to their fathers: lest I come, and strike the earth<u>with anathema</u>.
